required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

brief_summary.textblock: Marker of atrial cardiopathay as apredictor value of ischemic stroke

detailed_description.textblock: detection of the presence of atrial dysfunction or atrial cardiopathy and its degree among patients complaining of palpitation, with a one-year follow-up for any cardioembolic events (stroke /TIA).

primary_outcome.measure: Detection of any underlying arrythmia after holter monitoring for twenty four hours
primary_outcome.time_frame: Detection of any underlying arrythmia after holter monitoring for twenty four hours
primary_outcome.description: Detection of any underlying arrythmia after holter monitoring for twenty four hours

secondary_outcome.measure: Detection of atrial dysfunction or atrial cardiopathy and its degree among patients complaining of palpitation, with 6 month follow-up for any cardioembolic events (stroke /TIA).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Detection of atrial dysfunction or atrial cardiopathy and its degree among patients complaining of palpitation, with 6 month follow-up for any cardioembolic events (stroke /TIA).
secondary_outcome.description: Detection of atrial dysfunction or atrial cardiopathy and its degree among patients complaining of palpitation, with 6 month follow-up for any cardioembolic events (stroke /TIA).

intervention.description: A 24-h ambulatory Holter Echocardiography Speckle tracking echocardiography (STE)

study_pop.textblock: - Patients complaining of palpitation referred for Holter monitoring

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients complaining of palpitation referred for Holter monitoring
Exclusion Criteria:
- â€¢ Valvular AF, moderate to severe mitral/ tricuspid/ aortic stenosis or regurgitation.
- Recent myocardial infarction within 3 months.
- Acute pulmonary embolism.
- Newly onset AF during or shortly after cardiac surgery.
- Specific type of cardiomyopathy such as cardiac amyloidosis, obstructive hypertrophic cardiomyopathy.
Decompensation stage of organ failure
